title: Colorado National Monument: Shrubs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Plants     Shrubs                Shrubs               Big Sagebrush (Artemisia tridentata) Other names: common sagebrush, blue sagebrush, black sagebrush, mountain sagebrush             Cliffrose (Cowania mexicana) Other names: quininebush             Fendlerbush (Fendlera rupicola) Other names: cliff fendlerbush, false mockorange             Four-wing saltbush (Atriplex canescens)              Greasewood (Sarcobatus vermiculatus)              Manzanita (Arctostaphylos patula) Other names: Greenleaf manzanita             Mormon Tea (Ephedra viridis) Other names: Joint-fir, Brigham tea             Mountain Mahogany (Cercocarpus sp.)              Rabbitbrush (Chrysothamnus sp.)             Skunkbush (Rhus aromatic ssp. trilobata) Other names: skunkbush sumac, lemonbush, threeleaf sumac             Snakeweed (Gutierrezia sarothrae) Other names: broom snakeweed             Utah Serviceberry (Amelauchier utahensis)
